body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Have 2 creatures in play
2. Equip Ring of Kalonia to a creature (assume both do not have trample naturally)
3. See damage from unequipped creature assigned as though it had trample. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The creature that has no nature trample and is not equipped with the RoK should not assign damage as though it had trample.

Creatures on field were Kessig Recluse and Roaring Primadox attacking into a Priest of Norn and a saproling token (1/1). What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.48, Ubuntu If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Attachment storage is full. Please provide any additional information below.
